## Crypto Cipher
  
#### Using Encryption  
```js
let CryptoCipher = require('cryptocipher');

// Recommends aes256
CryptoCipher.encrypt('cryptography', 'plaintext').then((data) => {
	console.log(data);
	// Structure
	// { salt: 'tPe3jSCPzxOP4LZq41UGEccu', cryptography: 'aes256', hash: '738e938e6123a979764a3fc7e384bb37' }
}).catch((err) => {
	console.log(err);
	// Invalid Cryptography Type generally causes errors.
});
```
  
#### Using Decryption
```js
let CryptoCipher = require('cryptocipher');

// Recommends aes256
CryptoCipher.decrypt('cryptography', 'saltkey', 'hashedtext').then((data) => {
	console.log(data);
	// Structure
	// { original: 'plaintext' }
}).catch((err) => {
	console.log(err);
	// Invalid Cryptography Type generally causes errors.
});
```
